front: CA's Sierra Nevada Mountains sometimes have COLORED snow!  Do you know what color?
back: Pink (caused by a microscopic reddish-colored algae, chlamydomonas nivalis, that lives only in cold climates)

front: How big is the largest recorded piece of hail in the USA?
back: 8 inches, 1.9375 lbs! (Recorded in Vivian, SD from a storm on July 23, 2010)

front: Recorded in 1934 on the summit of Mount Washington in New Hampshire, what is the highest wind speed ever recorded?
back: 231 miles per hour (372 kilometers per hour)!!!
